attributes.action: Help The people of Syria! Not just help, but also defeat Assad and his troops.
attributes.background: Syrians are suffering. They are relying on us to help them. We call for all to sign this petition in order for GB to intervene and help the people and to also defeat Assad.

rejection.details:
You could create another petition which clarified whether you were calling for a military intervention, or a diplomatic and/or humanitarian intervention. 

If you are calling for a diplomatic or humanitarian intervention you might want to consider supporting the following petitions. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169466
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/174614
